entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:31 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -35.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 01:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %

Dewpoint: -39.3°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 38. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 38.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 38. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023
